meanings.sent1: The hemihydrated soil was damp but not fully wet.
meanings.sent2: The scientist observed the hemihydrated sample under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The hemihydrated sponge was like a thirsty plant waiting for rain.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm for the project was hemihydrated, lacking full commitment.
meanings.sent5: The hemihydrated paint dried unevenly, leaving streaks of color.

meanings.definition: Having half the water content needed for full hydration
meanings.sent1: The hemihydrated pasta needed more water to cook properly.
meanings.sent2: The hemihydrated concrete mixture was too dry to pour.
meanings.sent3: The hemihydrated plant struggled to grow with insufficient water.
meanings.sent4: His hemihydrated enthusiasm for the party waned as the night went on.
meanings.sent5: The hemihydrated sponge soaked up water slowly, showing its limited capacity.
